items.text: Student shall Search study rooms. The system shall Show study rooms with available seats based on search criteria. Constraints: Must filter by campus, date, and time range.

spans.text: Show study rooms with available seats based on search criteria.
Must filter by campus, date, and time range

items.text: Student shall Reserve seats. The system shall Allow reservation of one or more seats for the chosen time slot. Preconditions: Student is authenticated. Constraints: Limited to chosen time slot.

spans.text: Allow reservation of one or more seats for the chosen time slot.

items.text: Student shall Attempt reservation with insufficient seats. The system shall Reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots. Preconditions: Selected room has insufficient available seats. Exceptions: Insufficient available seats.

spans.text: Reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots.
Selected room has insufficient available seats

items.text: System shall Create reservation record. The system shall Store room identifier, date, start time, end time, and number of seats. Constraints: Include all mandatory booking fields.

spans.text: Store room identifier, date, start time, end time, and number of seats.

items.text: Student shall Create a booking. The system shall Validate and allow/prevent booking based on daily and weekly limits. Constraints: Max 2 active reservations per day; Max 6 active reservations per week. Exceptions: Booking limit exceeded.

spans.text: Validate and allow/prevent booking based on daily and weekly limits.

items.text: Student shall Create booking for same time range. The system shall Block the creation of the new booking. Preconditions: Student already has an active booking for the same time range. Exceptions: Overlapping booking conflict.

spans.text: Create booking for same time range
Block the creation of the new booking.
Student already has an active booking for the same time range

items.text: Student shall Cancel a booking. The system shall Cancel the booking; mark as late-cancel if done less than 30 mins before start. Constraints: Cancel at least 30 minutes before start time. Exceptions: Late-cancel status applied.

spans.text: Cancel the booking; mark as late-cancel if done less than 30 mins before start.
if done less than 30 mins before start.
Cancel at least 30 minutes before start time

items.text: System shall Process cancellation. The system shall Release reserved seats and notify waitlisted students. Preconditions: Reservation is canceled. Constraints: Immediate release of seats.

spans.text: Release reserved seats and notify waitlisted students.

items.text: Student shall Join a waitlist. The system shall Add student to the waitlist for the specific room and date. Preconditions: Room is fully booked.

spans.text: Add student to the waitlist for the specific room and date.

items.text: System shall Notify waitlist. The system shall Offer slot to the first student on the list with a confirmation timer. Preconditions: Room becomes available. Constraints: 10-minute confirmation window.

spans.text: Offer slot to the first student on the list with a confirmation timer.

items.text: System shall Process waitlist timeout. The system shall Offer the slot to the next student on the list. Preconditions: Current student does not confirm within 10 minutes. Exceptions: Waitlist confirmation timeout.

spans.text: Offer the slot to the next student on the list.
Current student does not confirm within 10 minutes

items.text: System shall Send confirmation. The system shall Send email and in-app notification of successful booking. Preconditions: Reservation is successful. Constraints: Sent within 1 minute.

spans.text: Send email and in-app notification of successful booking.

items.text: Student shall Check in for reservation. The system shall Confirm and record the student's arrival. Preconditions: Valid reservation exists. Constraints: 10 mins before to 15 mins after start time.

spans.text: Confirm and record the student's arrival.
10 mins before to 15 mins after start time

items.text: System shall Process missed check-in. The system shall Automatically cancel booking and record a no-show. Preconditions: No check-in by 15 minutes after start time. Exceptions: Automated no-show cancellation.

spans.text: Automatically cancel booking and record a no-show.
No check-in by 15 minutes after start time

items.text: System shall Apply penalty. The system shall Suspend student booking privileges for 7 days. Preconditions: Three no-shows recorded within 30 days. Constraints: 7-day suspension period. Exceptions: Privilege suspension.

spans.text: Suspend student booking privileges for 7 days.

items.text: System shall Display room info. The system shall Show capacity, equipment, and accessibility details. Preconditions: Before booking is initiated.

spans.text: Show capacity, equipment, and accessibility details.

items.text: Student shall Filter rooms. The system shall Show rooms matching capacity and equipment requirements. Constraints: Minimum capacity; Required equipment.

spans.text: Show rooms matching capacity and equipment requirements.

items.text: Student shall Request too many seats. The system shall Prevent reservation and explain the capacity limit. Preconditions: Seats requested > seats available. Exceptions: Capacity constraint error.

spans.text: Prevent reservation and explain the capacity limit.

items.text: Student shall Modify reservation. The system shall Update booking details if rules allow. Preconditions: Must satisfy booking limits; Must not overlap existing bookings. Exceptions: Modification rejected.

spans.text: Update booking details if rules allow.

items.text: System shall Log audit data. The system shall Log event details with timestamp and user ID. Preconditions: Booking event occurs (create, modify, cancel, no-show). Constraints: Immutable log entry.

spans.text: Log event details with timestamp and user ID.
Booking event occurs (create, modify, cancel, no-show)

items.text: Administrative Staff shall Create/Define room. The system shall Save room campus, hours, and max reservation length. Preconditions: Authorized staff access.

spans.text: Save room campus, hours, and max reservation length.

items.text: System shall Enforce booking duration. The system shall Restrict reservation duration to the room's maximum limit. Constraints: Max reservation length defined per room. Exceptions: Duration limit exceeded.

spans.text: Restrict reservation duration to the room's maximum limit.
Max reservation length defined per room

items.text: Student shall Book outside hours. The system shall Reject the request and display opening hours. Preconditions: Booking time outside room opening hours. Exceptions: Operating hours violation.

spans.text: Reject the request and display opening hours.
Booking time outside room opening hours

items.text: Staff shall Block room for maintenance. The system shall Hide room from availability search during maintenance. Preconditions: Authorized staff access.

spans.text: Hide room from availability search during maintenance.

items.text: System shall Handle maintenance conflict. The system shall Notify students and suggest alternative rooms. Preconditions: Maintenance block overlaps existing bookings. Constraints: Alternatives must be of similar capacity. Exceptions: No alternative rooms available.

spans.text: Notify students and suggest alternative rooms.
Alternatives must be of similar capacity

items.text: Student shall Create group booking. The system shall Send invitations to all group members; allow them to accept or decline. Preconditions: Room type is designated for groups. Constraints: At least 3 members must be invited.

spans.text: Send invitations to all group members; allow them to accept or decline.
Room type is designated for groups
At least 3 members must be invited

items.text: System shall Monitor group acceptance. The system shall Prompt organizer student to confirm or cancel the booking. Preconditions: Fewer than 50% of invitees have accepted; Current time is 2 hours before start. Constraints: Notification must be sent to the organizer.

spans.text: Prompt organizer student to confirm or cancel the booking.
Fewer than 50% of invitees have accepted
Current time is 2 hours before start
Notification must be sent to the organizer

items.text: Student shall Remove invited student. The system shall Remove student from the group booking and notify them of the change. Preconditions: Action performed before reservation start time.

spans.text: Remove student from the group booking and notify them of the change.
Action performed before reservation start time

items.text: Student shall View/Export bookings. The system shall Provide a calendar view of reservations and allow iCalendar file export. Preconditions: Student is authenticated. Constraints: Export must be compatible with iCalendar (.ics) specification.

spans.text: Provide a calendar view of reservations and allow iCalendar file export.
Export must be compatible with iCalendar (.ics) specification

items.text: Unauthenticated User shall View availability. The system shall Provide read-only access to room availability and prompt for authentication. Constraints: university SSO authentication required for full access and booking functionality.

spans.text: Provide read-only access to room availability and prompt for authentication
university SSO authentication required for full access and booking functionality

items.text: System shall Protect personal data. The system shall Encrypt student data at rest and use TLS for all transmissions. Constraints: Applies to name, email, and student ID; transmission must uses TLS.

spans.text: Encrypt student data at rest and use TLS for all transmissions.
Applies to name, email, and student ID

items.text: Student shall Report room issue. The system shall Create a maintenance ticket and notify the administrative staff. Preconditions: Student is logged in. Constraints: Include Room ID and issue description.

spans.text: Create a maintenance ticket and notify the administrative staff.
Include Room ID and issue description

items.text: System shall Handle critical issue. The system shall Automatically block the room from future availability. Preconditions: Issue is marked as 'Critical' by administrative staff. Constraints: Room remains hidden until status is updated to 'Resolved'.

spans.text: Automatically block the room from future availability.
Issue is marked as 'Critical' by administrative staff
Room remains hidden until status is updated to 'Resolved'

items.text: System shall Enforce fair-use acceptance. The system shall Display the fair-use policy and block booking until accepted. Preconditions: User is making their first-ever booking. Constraints: Explicit acceptance (checkbox or button) required; Policy must be displayed before booking. Exceptions: Policy not accepted.

spans.text: Display the fair-use policy and block booking until accepted.
User is making their first-ever booking
Policy must be displayed before booking

items.text: System shall Enforce fair-use policy. The system shall Issue a warning to the student and escalate to privilege suspension if repeated. Preconditions: System detects a policy violation (e.g., automated scripts). Exceptions: Privilege suspension applied.

spans.text: Issue a warning to the student and escalate to privilege suspension if repeated.
System detects a policy violation (e.g., automated scripts)

items.text: Administrative Staff shall Views room utilization reports. The system shall Displays summaries of room usage frequency and identifies peak usage times. Constraints: Report must cover exactly the previous 30 days of data.

spans.text: Displays summaries of room usage frequency and identifies peak usage times.
Report must cover exactly the previous 30 days of data

items.text: System shall Process search queries. The system shall Executes search and returns results to the user. Preconditions: Normal system load conditions. Constraints: Response time ≤ 2 seconds for 95% of requests.

spans.text: Executes search and returns results to the user.
Response time ≤ 2 seconds for 95% of requests

items.text: System shall Manage notification failure. The system shall Queue outgoing notifications and attempt redelivery. Preconditions: Internal or external notification service is unavailable. Constraints: Retry for up to 24 hours; Ensure zero data loss for alerts. Exceptions: Notification service failure.

spans.text: Queue outgoing notifications and attempt redelivery.
Internal or external notification service is unavailable
Ensure zero data loss for alerts

items.text: User shall Switch language. The system shall Update all UI labels, navigation, and messages to selected language. Constraints: Must support English and Italian at a minimum.

spans.text: Update all UI labels, navigation, and messages to selected language.
Must support English and Italian at a minimum

items.text: System shall Handle concurrent requests. The system shall Perform atomic allocation or return conflict error. Preconditions: Simultaneous requests for same seats; Insufficient capacity. Constraints: Room capacity must never be exceeded; Seat allocation must be atomic. Exceptions: Reservation conflict error.

spans.text: Perform atomic allocation or return conflict error.
Room capacity must never be exceeded

items.text: Student shall Create recurring reservation. The system shall Generate a series of weekly reservations for up to 4 weeks. Preconditions: Each occurrence satisfies booking limits; Each occurrence satisfies opening hours. Constraints: Maximum of 4 consecutive weeks.

spans.text: Generate a series of weekly reservations for up to 4 weeks.

items.text: System shall Handle late check-in. The system shall Record check-in while maintaining the original end time. Preconditions: Student checks in after start time but within 15 minutes. Constraints: No duration extension permitted; Check-in must be recorded within 15 minutes past start time.

spans.text: Record check-in while maintaining the original end time.
while maintaining the original end time.
Student checks in after start time but within 15 minutes
Check-in must be recorded within 15 minutes past start time

items.text: System shall Display room location details. The system shall Display building, floor, and a link to the room floor plan before booking confirmation. Preconditions: Before booking is confirmed. Constraints: Must display building; Must display floor; Must provide floor plan link.

spans.text: Display building, floor, and a link to the room floor plan before booking confirmation.

items.text: Administrative Staff shall Define cleaning buffer time. The system shall Save cleaning buffer time for the room and prevent bookings that violate the buffer period. Preconditions: Authorized staff access. Constraints: Buffer time must be defined per room; System must prevent bookings that violate the buffer.

spans.text: Save cleaning buffer time for the room and prevent bookings that violate the buffer period.
Buffer time must be defined per room
System must prevent bookings that violate the buffer

items.text: System shall Automatically record check-in via occupancy sensors. The system shall Automatically record check-in when occupancy is detected within the allowed check-in window. Preconditions: Occupancy sensors are available for the room; Occupancy is detected within the allowed check-in window. Constraints: Must be within the allowed check-in window.

spans.text: Automatically record check-in via occupancy sensors
Automatically record check-in when occupancy is detected within the allowed check-in window.
when occupancy is detected within the allowed check-in window.
Occupancy sensors are available for the room
Occupancy is detected within the allowed check-in window
Must be within the allowed check-in window

items.text: System shall Maintain system uptime. The system shall Maintain at least 99.5% monthly uptime, excluding scheduled maintenance windows announced in advance. Constraints: At least 99.5% monthly uptime; Excludes scheduled maintenance windows announced in advance.

spans.text: Maintain at least 99.5% monthly uptime, excluding scheduled maintenance windows announced in advance.
Excludes scheduled maintenance windows announced in advance

items.text: System shall Enforce API rate limiting. The system shall Enforce rate limiting of 60 requests per minute per user on all public API endpoints; return HTTP 429 error with retry-after time if limit is exceeded. Constraints: 60 requests per minute per user limit; Applies to all public API endpoints. Exceptions: Rate limit exceeded - HTTP 429 error returned.

spans.text: Enforce rate limiting of 60 requests per minute per user on all public API endpoints; return HTTP 429 error with retry-after time if limit is exceeded.
60 requests per minute per user limit
Applies to all public API endpoints
Rate limit exceeded - HTTP 429 error returned

items.text: Unauthenticated User shall View room availability and features. The system shall Display room availability and room features while hiding personal booking details and user identifiers. Constraints: Must hide personal booking details; Must hide user identifiers.

spans.text: Display room availability and room features while hiding personal booking details and user identifiers.
while hiding personal booking details and user identifiers.

items.text: System shall Enforce access control and audit logging. The system shall Require role-based access control for staff actions that change system state and record them in an immutable audit log. Constraints: Role-based access control required; Audit log must be immutable.

spans.text: Enforce access control and audit logging
Require role-based access control for staff actions that change system state and record them in an immutable audit log.

items.text: System shall Handle room occupancy conflict. The system shall Create a priority ticket for staff and offer alternative rooms of similar capacity when available. Preconditions: Student reports that a booked room is occupied by others at the start time. Constraints: Priority ticket must be created; Alternative rooms must be of similar capacity; Alternatives only offered when available.

spans.text: Create a priority ticket for staff and offer alternative rooms of similar capacity when available.
Student reports that a booked room is occupied by others at the start time
Alternative rooms must be of similar capacity
